news_0.description: BBC Sport looks at the big talking points from UFC 273 as Alexander Volkanovski beats the 'Korean Zombie' Chan Sung Jung to retain his featherweight title.
news_0.author: Caroline Fox
news_0.title: UFC 273: Five things we learned as Alexander Volkanovski dominates 'Korean Zombie'
news_0.content:
Volkanovski earned a performance-of-the-night bonus for his win over Chan Sung Jung
Alexander Volkanovski cemented his status as the world's best featherweight with a flawless victory over the 'Kore…

news_1.description: The nation’s founding fathers hunted foxes for sport. This week, a rabid fox that bit nine people near the U.S. Capitol led to a very different type of hunt.
news_1.author: Leah Askarinam
news_1.title: Foxes and D.C. Politicians Don’t Mix, As This Week and History Show
news_1.content:
George Washington himself was an avid fox hunter and even bred his own fox hounds. Today, Washington, the father of our country, is also known as the father of the American foxhound.
Washington was …

news_2.author: Sean Ingle
news_2.title: Transgender cyclist Emily Bridges set for lottery funding if allowed to compete
news_2.content:
UK Sport says it will support transgender cyclist Emily Bridges with lottery funding in the build up to the Paris 2024 Olympics if she is allowed to compete in the womens category.
The confirmation …

news_3.description: Japan's double Olympic speed skating champion Nana Takagi announced her retirement from the sport on Tuesday.
news_3.author: Samuel
news_3.title: Japan's double Olympic champion Takagi retires - Reuters.com
news_3.content:
April 5 (Reuters) - Japan's double Olympic speed skating champion Nana Takagi announced her retirement from the sport on Tuesday.
The 29-year-old won gold in the inaugural women's mass start competi…
